name: places/ChIJIYVQckf3wokRFJKxy1l_1Wg
formattedAddress: 1689 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10031, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1689 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10031-6106, USA

originalText.text:
Do not trust the 4.9 star review rating, if you read closer many reviews have similar verbage and wording and I think are fake accounts.

The service was 5 stars by the end, but the price was double what online quotes as reasonable for NYC lock repairs.  I paid 538$ (plus tip) for a man to attempt to repair a code-in door lock.  He worked for 1.5 hours and it broke off again within 2 minutes of him leaving.  He then promptly returned and didn't charge anything to install our original old fashioned key lock.

He did his job well, was courteous, fast, and tried his best, but I believe the charge should've been half what it ended up being.

If you use this company, AGREE to the price and get it all signed BEFORE they do any repairs.

originalText.text: Locked my keys in the car at a gas station, and this locksmith arrived within 20 minutes. Quick entry, fair pricing, and friendly service. I'm a happy customer.

text.text: Locked my keys in the car at a gas station, and this locksmith arrived within 20 minutes. Quick entry, fair pricing, and friendly service. I'm a happy customer.

originalText.text: Quick and effective locksmith service. The technician resolved our house lockout efficiently, and the pricing was fair. Dependable and trustworthy.

text.text: Quick and effective locksmith service. The technician resolved our house lockout efficiently, and the pricing was fair. Dependable and trustworthy.

originalText.text: I needed to replace a faulty lock on my back door, and this locksmith offered a cost-effective solution. They were punctual and left my home secure. Highly satisfied!

originalText.text: Business Lock Change was vital for our office security, and the locksmith exceeded our expectations. Quick and efficient service.
